Hubblepy - Python API Wrapper of the HubbleSite API¶

Thank you for checking out the hubblepy documentation! hubblepy is meant to be an easy-to-use and lightweight API wrapper of the HubbleSite API which allows for programmatic access of resources and content available on http://hubblesite.org/.
